dialogue: All it takes is one mistake. Just one mistake and everything changes.
It could be forgeting something in moments notice, a small miscalculation or even just ignoring the faintest detail
And before you know it, it costs you something dearly. You won't know what it is until it happens.
And in some cases... You may not even know it has happened.
Till all five of your senses, and every cell in your system flare up in an instant of regret
And as a collective, for only a fraction of a second all unify one solid voice in your head
Your first words seared into your mind as you wake up with a burning headache
To your disappointment, you remember every detail vividly, as if it had happened yesterday.
The throbbing in your skull, a reminder of the blunt object that claimed your consciousness but not your life
Your ass, the source of your current predicament, throbbing and leaking man fluids
No amnesia, no bodily possession, not drugged or drunk to blame this on
STO- AHHHHH~~
The cry of passion from one of your battle mates clears your fractured thoughts and finally you act
... is what you would do if your legs woke up with you
Ahhh ahhh nnngh
You survey the area for the source of the sound only to finally realize where you are
Surrounding you are layers of bedsheets and mountains of cloth each somehow stained with your previous lover's bodily fluids
...Thankfully there's no sign of him anywhere. This will make fixing everything a lot easier you hope.
AHHH
SHUT THE FUCK UP WHORE!
A loud slap echos through the corridor to match the booming sound of the other's voice
Please I'm sorry we won't MMMMMPH
The 'Whore' in question was silenced quickly possibly with a gag.
All these slaves...JUST
MMPH
FOR
MMMPPPHH
ME
NNNNGM MMMPPH
You climb pass the covers of the bed and take in your surroundings
